SectionHero.headline: Streamline team workflows with visual task management
SectionHero.paragraph: Create project boards instantly, assign tasks efficiently, and keep your team aligned on what matters most.

SectionPricing.label: Pricing
SectionPricing.headline: A pricing that adapts to your needs

questions.question: How does smart task assignment work?
questions.answer: TaskFlow analyzes your team members' current workload, skills, and past performance to suggest optimal task assignments. You can accept suggestions or manually assign tasks as needed.

questions.question: Can I integrate with other tools?
questions.answer: Yes, TaskFlow integrates with popular tools like Slack, Google Calendar, and GitHub to keep your workflow connected and synchronized.

questions.question: Is there a mobile app?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer native iOS and Android apps so your team can stay productive on the go with full access to all features.
